title: Macworld Podcast: The upcoming new Apple products that matter
content:
The fall season is the season when Apple seems to be dropping everything—operating systems, laptops, tablets, watches and more. But of all the products coming from Cupertino, what are the Macworld editors most looking forward to? We cover that in this episode of the Macworld Podcast.

This is episode 757 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
